violationsByInspectionidList.violationDescription:
A FOOD specified in ¶ 3-501.17(A) or (B) shall be discarded if it:  
    (1) Exceeds the temperature and time combination specified in ¶ 3-501.17(A),              except time that the product is frozen; (P)
    (2) Is in a container or PACKAGE that does not bear a date or day; (P) or
    (3) Is appropriately marked with a date or day that exceeds a temperature and              time combination as specified in ¶ 3-501.17(A). (P)

(A) A HANDWASHING SINK shall be maintained so that it is accessible at all times for EMPLOYEE use and used for no other purpose. (Pf)
(B)  An automatic handwashing facility shall be used in accordance with manufacturer's instructions. (Pf)
